PowerGridSynth OverviewÔÉÅ

PowerGridSynth (Power grid synthesizer) is an open source project written in Python, dedicated to build synthetic power grids. The goal of the project is to provide realistic yet synthetic power grids for grid modeling, simulation and analysis, with the ultimate goal of building Foundation Models for power grids. It is part of LF Energy, a Linux Foundation focused on energy sector. This project is supported by AI-EFFECT (Artificial Intelligence Experimentation Facility For the Energy Sector).

It contains three main components:

  • grid topology generation,

  • grid data generation,

  • grid data utility.
